title: State Fair
description: "Each Benni Harper mystery is better than the previous" ("Midwest Book Review")Folk art museum curator, rancher, and sometime sleuth Benni Harper returns with a long-awaited new mystery that has her attending the San Celina Mid-State Fair-a place for caramel apples and 4-H calves, colorful quilts and homemade jams, and maybe just a little murder...
author: Earlene Fowler
